title: What are real life pedal equation applications? - Quora

response.answer_text: AI Autonomous Driving Vehicles There may be established baseline real world data available from automotive test labs using Engineers/Technicians to drive Test Cycles. Working with the Air Resources Board, we tested several vehicles daily, test vehicles sourced by manufacturers, others supplied by California drivers, some supplied by local stakeholders with Fleets, and used several Established Drive Test Cycles to gather information about vehicle and engine emissions. The drivers had to follow the driving cycle traced in each program in Urban Driving and Highway Driving Simulation(s).
